channel.title: npm on Amor
channel.description: Recent content in npm on Amor

item.title: how to launch browser when used npm start
item.description: // Windows "start":"start http://localhost:8081 & node bin/www" // Mac "start":"open http://localhost:8081 && node bin/www" // Linux "start":"xdg-open http://localhost:8081 && node bin/www"
